titleStmt.title: Han Gu Yizhou Taishou Beihai Xiang Jing Jun Ming漢故益州太守北海相景君銘
Inscription for Han Former Governor of Yi Region and Counselor of Beihai Commandery Lord Jing

publicationStmt.p: This is a transcription of dirge from Han dynasty, edited by Avery Clare.

bibl.author: Xu Yuli徐玉立（editor）
bibl.publisher: Henan meishu chubanshe河南美術出版社
bibl.title: Hanbei quanji漢碑全集

handDesc.p: Written in clerical script隸書. The epigraph is written in seal script篆書.

origin.p: Established in Rencheng任城 county in 143 AD.

lg.l: 惟漢安二年，仲秋□□，故北海任城景府君卒。
歍歔哀哉！
國□□寶，英彥失疇
列宿虧精，晚學後時
于何穹倉，布命授期
有生有死，天寔爲之
豈夫仁哲，攸剋不遺
於是故吏/ line 3 諸生相與論曰
上世羣后
莫不流光□於無窮，垂芬燿於書篇
身歿而行明，體亡而 line 4 名存
或著形像於列圖，或毄頌於管弦
後來詠其烈，竹帛敘其勳
乃作誄曰
伏惟明府，受質自天
孝弟淵懿，帥禮蹈仁
根道核蓺，抱淑守真
皛白清方，勊己治身
寔渘寔剛，乃武乃文
遵考孝謁，假階司農
流惪元城，興利恵民
強衙改節，微弱蒙恩
威立澤宣，化行如神
帝嘉厥功，授以苻命
守郡益州，路遐攣親
躬伯遜讓，夙宵朝廷
建筴忠讜，辨秩東衍
璽追嘉錫，據北海相
部城十九，鄰邦歸向
分明好𢝏，先以敬讓
殘僞易心，輕黠踰競
鴟䲷不鳴，分子還養
元元鰥寡，蒙祐以寧
蓄道脩悳，□祉以榮
紛紛令儀，明府體之
仁義道術，明府膺之
黃朱邵父，明府三之
台輔之任，明府宜之
以病被徵，委位致仕
民□思慕，遠近搔首
農夫醳耒，商人空市
隨轝飲淚
奈何朝廷，奪我慈父
去官未旬，病乃困危
珪璧之質，臨卒不回
歔欷霣絕，奄忽不遲
孝子憉𢣦，顛倒剝摧
遂不勊寤，永潛長歸
州里鄉黨，隕涕奔哀
故吏忉怛，歔欷低佪
四海冠盖，驚𢝆傷褢
大命所期，寔惟天授
明主設位，明府不就
臣子欲養，明府弗留
歍歔哀哉
亂曰：
考積幽穸，表至□兮
□□□□，翔議郎兮
再命虎將，綏元元兮
規策榘謨，主忠信兮
羽衛藩屏，撫萬民兮
□□□□，恩彌盛兮
宜參鼎𨋥，堅榦楨兮
不永麋壽，棄臣子兮
仁敦海岱，著甘棠兮
刊石勒銘，□不亡兮
In the second year of Han’an Reign (143 CE), mid-autumn □□, lord Jing, former governor of Ren county in Beihai Commandery passed away.
Alas, how grievous!
The empire □□ treasure, the outstanding scholars lost their compeer.
All the constellations lost the essence, the latter scholars and the pupils are late in time.
From where does the Heaven, arranges/promulgates the Fate and confers the term.
There is life and there is death, Heaven really governs it.
How could that benevolent sage, be cut down/subdued and not be left.
Therefore the former subordinates and all the students discussed with each other, said:
The high officials in the ancient times,
none of them does not shed light □ on the infinity, droop fragrant (reputation) and glory on the books/writings and pieces/bamboos.
The self is dead whereas the deeds are expounded, the body is expired whereas the name is preserved.
Some (of them) have the figures drawn on the pictures, some have the odes hit by the winds and strings
The posterity chants their contributions, the bamboos and silks narrate their exploits.
Then composed the dirge, says:
Prostrating and thinking of Enlightened Repositor, (he) received substance from Heaven.
Faithful and deeply virtuous, (he) followed the rituals and carried out humaneness.
(He) pursued the Way and followed the artistry/standard/norm, cherished the pureness and kept the natural property.
Bright and white, clear and upright, (he) subdued the self and cultivated himself.
Truly he was gentle and truly he was firm, he is martial and he is literate.
Followed his father's advice and attended the filial examination, was given the (informal) official rank of Chamberlain for the National Treasury.
Shed virtue to Yuan-cheng, procured profits and benefitted the people.
The brutal bailiffs improved the courtesy, the humble and the feeble received the bounty.
The prestige was established and the grace was propagated, cultivated conducts as if a deity.
The emperor approbated his deeds, appointed him with the tally and decree.
Guarded the commanderies of Yi Region, the journey was far and (he was) concerned of the parents.
He bent to the elders and modestly declined, day and night (towards) the imperial court.
(He) proposed official documents/stratagems with loyal and upright advice, distinguished the order in the eastern marsh/hillside (spring ploughing).
The imperial signet superadded the official appointment, (he) occupied the position of the Counselor of Beihai Commandery
Commanded nineteen cities, the neighboring countries are inclining toward (him).
Clearly demarcated the preferences and the wicked, prioritized with respect and concession.
The demolished and the falsified changed mind, the light and cunning exceeded competition.
The owls does not cry, the parted children returned to serve/support the parents.
The multitude/the common people and the widowers and the widows, be granted the blessings, by which are in the serenity/peaceful.
Accumulating the Way and cultivating virtue, □ blessedness with prosperity.
The myriad esteemed rituals, Enlightened Repositor incarnated them.
Benevolence and righteousness and the Wat and tactics, Enlightened Repositor embraced them.
Huang Zhu/The sagacious emperors and Father Shao, Enlightened Repositor joined to be the third of them.
The official position of the Three Dukes and the buttresses, Enlightened Repositor is suitable for them.
In the illness he was summoned, (he) entrusted the official post and resigned.
The people □ thought (of him) ardently, far and near were scratching the heads agitated.
The farmers put down the plow, the tradesmen left the markets vacant,
with every entirety swallowed the tears.
How come the imperial court, deprived me of my benevolent father?
Within ten days after (he) quit the office, the illness became hindering and critical.
The substance of jade-tablet and jade-disc/circlet, on the verge of death (it) is not returning.
Wept woefully for (his) perish, all of a sudden (he) deceased with no delay.
The filial sons crashed and collided, toppled and grieved and torn apart.
After all (he) did not overcome the sleepiness, permanently submerged and perpetually resort (to the underworld).
The fellow villagers of the households and parishes in the prefecture, falling tears and dart to the mourning rite.
The former subordinates are in anguish, sobbing and hovering.
The caps and (carriage) canopies of the whole country, were startled and sorely grieved, full of sorrow.
What the Fate is fixed, truly it is conferred by Heaven.
The enlightened ruler set up the position, Enlightened Repositor did not take it.
The vassals desire to serve, Enlightened Repositor would not stay.
Alas, how grievous!
The coda says:
Examining the accumulation and the dusky night (tomb), to express the extreme □.Alas.
□□□□, soared the (spirit of) Court Gentleman for Consultation. Alas.
Appointed the tiger-like general/brave general gain, soothed the common people. Alas.
The norm-like stratagems and rule-like advice, regarded allegiance and faith as the most important.
Assisted the guardians and defended the shields, consoled the myriad people. Alas.
□□□□, the grace is more and more brimful. Alas.
Suitable to join the tripod vassals, to fasten/buttress the trunk of the pile. Alas.
Not eternal is the longevity, left the vassals behind. Alas.
The benevolence is profound (reaching toward) oceans and mountains(/Bohai and Mountain Tai), (people) composed Gan Tang. Alas.
Engraved on the stone and carved the inscriptions, □ would not perish. Alas.
